text: Purasaiwalkam taluk is a taluk of the city district of Chennai in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It was formed in December 2013 from parts of the erstwhile Fort-Tondiarpet and Perambur-Purasawalkam taluks. It comprises the neighbourhoods of Purasawalkam and Vepery. ==References== ===General=== * Taluks of Chennai district ===Specific=== Category:Taluks of Chennai district
title: Purasawalkam taluk
